mapper.sql: TID, PARA_CODE, PARENT_ID, PARA_NAME, PARA_TYPE, HAS_SUB, STATUS, ADDED, REMARKS
mapper.insert:
insert into t_para_dic
TID,
PARA_CODE,
PARENT_ID,
PARA_NAME,
PARA_TYPE,
HAS_SUB,
STATUS,
ADDED,
REMARKS,
#{tid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{paraCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{paraName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paraType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hasSub,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{added,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_para_dic
TID = #{record.tid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARA_CODE = #{record.paraCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARA_NAME = #{record.paraName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARA_TYPE = #{record.paraType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HAS_SUB = #{record.hasSub,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDED = #{record.added,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_para_dic set TID = #{record.tid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PARA_CODE = #{record.paraCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PARA_NAME = #{record.paraName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARA_TYPE = #{record.paraType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HAS_SUB = #{record.hasSub,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADDED = #{record.added,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_para_dic
PARA_CODE = #{paraCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARA_NAME = #{paraName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARA_TYPE = #{paraType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HAS_SUB = #{hasSub,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDED = #{added,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TID = #{tid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update t_para_dic set PARA_CODE = #{paraCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PARA_NAME = #{paraName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARA_TYPE = #{paraType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HAS_SUB = #{hasSub,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADDED = #{added,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TID = #{tid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_para_dic
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT PARA_CODE, PARA_NAME FROM `t_para_dic` WHERE `STATUS` = '1'
AND PARENT_ID = ( SELECT DISTINCT TID FROM t_para_dic WHERE PARA_CODE = #{paraCode} LIMIT 0,1 )
SELECT *, IF(FIND_IN_SET(PARA_CODE,REPLACE(#{cardtypes},';',',')),1,0) AS CHECKED FROM t_para_dic WHERE PARA_TYPE='CARDTYPE' AND HAS_SUB = 0;
SELECT PARA_CODE, PARA_NAME, ADDED FROM `t_para_dic` WHERE `STATUS` = '1' AND PARA_CODE=#{paraCode}
